snippet: Shares of Chipotle Mexican Grill were down after the chain closed restaurants in Oregon and Washington because of an E. coli outbreak.
abstract: Stocks rise, returning Dow Jones industrial average into positive territory for 2015.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Chipotle Mexican Grill were down after the chain closed restaurants in Oregon and Washington because of an E. coli outbreak.

headline.main: Market Continues Advance, Led by Health and Energy Sectors
headline.print_headline: Shares Log Gains, Returning Dow to Positive Territory
